description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Santas Xmas Dash is back and better than before! Help Santa deliver the presents, with all the great features of the first game plus a new multiplayer race mode and single player 60 second dash. With added support for the thumbstick and left/right triggers its more challenging than it ever was. Watch as events scroll on from the left giving you time to prepare for each event.
description.short: Santas Xmas Dash is back and better than before! Help Santa deliver the presents, with all the great features of the first game plus a new multiplayer race mode and single player 60 second dash. With added support for the thumbstick and left/right triggers its more challenging than it ever was. Watch as events scroll on from the left giving you time to prepare for each event.
